com.linecorp.armeria.client.limit

Interface ConcurrencyLimitingClient.Deferred<O extends Response>

  • Type Parameters:
    O - the Response type
    Enclosing class:
    ConcurrencyLimitingClient<I extends Request,O extends Response>

    public static interface ConcurrencyLimitingClient.Deferred<O extends Response>
    Provides the interface for updating the result of a Request execution when its Response is ready.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close(Throwable cause)
      Closes the response() without delegating.
      void delegate(O response)
      Delegates the response to the specified Response.
      O response()
      Returns the Response which will delegate to the Response set by delegate(Response).

    • Method Detail

      • response

        O response()
        Returns the Response which will delegate to the Response set by delegate(Response).

        Delegates the response to the specified Response.
